document.full_text: severe thunderstorms storms that raked the southeast with scattered tornadoes, large hail and high winds on saturday reemerged across the region on sunday after an overnight lull, meteorologists said.
document.title: storms pelt southeast with large hail for second day
lines_and_colors: severe thunderstorms storms that raked the southeast with scattered tornadoes, large hail and high winds on saturday reemerged across the region on sunday after an overnight lull, meteorologists said.
